The believers happy change by dying as it was recommended in a sermon preached, on the occasion of the death of Capt. Thomas Daniel Esq. who was interred the day before, November 17th. 1683 / by the reverend Mr. Joshua Moodey, late pastor of the Church of Christ at Portsmouth in New-England, now gone to rest. Moodey, Joshua, 1633?-1697.
32 p.
Printed by B. Green, and J. Allen, Boston in N. E. : 1697.
Reproduction of original in: Massachusetts Historical Society Library.
=======
